document.title: Efficient Reasoning with Range and Domain Constraints
document.abstract: We show how a tableaux algorithm for that include range and domain axioms, prove that the extended algorithm is still a decision concepts w.r.t. such a role box, and show how support for range and domian axioms can be exploited in order to add a new form of absorption optimisation called role absorption. We illustrate the effectiveness of the optimised algorithm by analysing the perfomance of our FaCT++ implementation when classifying terminologies derived from realistic ontologies. 1
document.venue: In Proc. of the 2004 Description Logic Workshop (DL 2004

author.name: Dmitry Tsarkov
author.affil: Department of Computer Science; The University of Manchester

author.name: Ian Horrocks
